Dropdown(Rect, SerializedObject, object, FieldInfo, string, int, object[], string[])

Creates a dropdown

Declaration
public static void Dropdown(Rect rect, SerializedObject serializedObject, object target, FieldInfo dropdownField, string label, int selectedValueIndex, object[] values, string[] displayOptions)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Rect rect

The rect the defines the position and size of the dropdown in the inspector
UnityEditor.SerializedObject serializedObject

The serialized object that is being updated
object target

The target object that contains the dropdown
System.Reflection.FieldInfo dropdownField

The field of the target object that holds the currently selected dropdown value
string label

The label of the dropdown
int selectedValueIndex

The index of the value from the values array
object[] values

The values of the dropdown
string[] displayOptions

The display options for the values
